name: Jonathan's Adventures
description:
Description:

It is the story of an adventurer named Jonathan who is caught by an ogre. your mission is to help him escape. 

Hello my name is Yin San. I don't speak English but I'm using Google Translator to write this and to make the game. 

Ps: 

This game has 2 endings. good luck.

2Ps:

This is my first time using AGS a very old game engine. So you will probably get a warning when you download it, but don't worry, it's not a virus.
